long_description: Finish Line Showroom Polish provides a brilliant shine plus long term protection on all bicycle surfaces, including steel, aluminum, carbon fiber, titanium, chrome and clear coat. Formulated with DuPont Teflon(R) Surface Protector; high-gloss Teflon fluoropolymers repel dirt and grime for easy post-ride cleanups. Restores and polishes all types of surfaces; contains no abrasives and is 100% safe for all plastics, rubbers and carbon fiber parts. Helps to prevent rust and minimize UV damage.
short_description: Finish Line Showroom Polish provides a brilliant shine plus long term protection on all bicycle surfaces, including steel, aluminum, carbon fiber, titanium, chrome and clear coat.
